definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: White phosphorus fragments smoldered and hissed in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 白磷彈碎屑在積雪悶燃或嘶嘶燃燒。

sentences.english: Israel initially claimed that it was not using white phosphorus.
sentences.chinese: 以軍最初聲稱他們並沒有使用白磷彈。

sentences.english: It has expunged the odour of decay that was once tangy with the chemical flavour of explosives and spent phosphorous.
sentences.chinese: 曾經爆炸和燃過白磷的刺鼻化學氣味已經消退了。

sentences.english: NATO pilots throwing white phosphorous on Beni Walid.
sentences.chinese: 北約飛行員向拜尼沃利德投擲白磷。

sentences.english: the shells burst in the air,billowing white smoke before dropping the phosphorus shell.
sentences.chinese: 白磷彈片在空中爆裂，並在落地之前湧放出白煙。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
